questions.question: What is the voting process?
questions.answer: The voting process involves selecting your candidates from the list after logging in. You can cast your vote once you're authenticated.

questions.question: How can I register?
questions.answer: To register, click on the 'New user? Register here' link on the homepage, fill out your details, and create an account.

questions.question: What are the eligibility criteria?
questions.answer: Only current students of the college are eligible to vote. Please ensure your details are up to date in the system.

questions.question: How can I change my vote?
questions.answer: Once you cast your vote, you cannot change it. Please double-check your selection before submitting.

questions.question: Who can be a candidate?
questions.answer: Any student who is registered and meets the eligibility criteria can stand for election as a candidate.

questions.question: When is the voting period?
questions.answer: The voting period will be posted on the official notice board.

questions.question: Can I vote if I'm not on campus?
questions.answer: Yes, as long as you're a registered student, you can vote online through the voting portal from anywhere.

questions.question: How do I know if my vote was successfully cast?
questions.answer: Once you submit your vote, you will receive a confirmation message on the screen, and you will also receive a confirmation email.

questions.question: Can I vote for more than one candidate in a category?
questions.answer: No, you can only vote for one candidate in each category. Be sure to select your preferred candidate before submitting your vote.

questions.question: What happens if I submit my vote accidentally?
questions.answer: Once you submit your vote, it cannot be undone. Be sure to double-check your selections before confirming.

questions.question: Can I see the list of candidates before voting?
questions.answer: Yes, the list of candidates will be displayed along with their details, such as their background and manifesto, before you cast your vote.

questions.question: How will the election results be announced?
questions.answer: The election results will be announced on the official college website and posted on the notice board after the voting period ends.

questions.question: How do I contact support if I face issues during voting?
questions.answer: If you encounter any issues, you can contact the IT support team through the 'Contact Us' section on the voting portal.

questions.question: Are the election results confidential?
questions.answer: Yes, your vote is anonymous and confidential. The system ensures that no one can trace your vote back to you.

questions.question: What happens if I miss the voting deadline?
questions.answer: Once the voting period is over, no more votes can be cast. Be sure to vote before the deadline to ensure your voice is heard.

questions.question: Is there a limit to how many times I can log in to vote?
questions.answer: Yes,you can only vote one time, but there is no limit on how many times you can log in to check your details.

questions.question: Can I vote for candidates in different categories?
questions.answer: Yes, you can vote for candidates in different categories as long as you meet the eligibility criteria for each category.

questions.question: What if I donâ€™t agree with the election results?
questions.answer: If you have concerns or questions about the election process, you can contact the student body or the election committee for clarification.

questions.question: How are the votes counted?
questions.answer: Votes are automatically counted through the voting system. The results are processed and displayed once the voting period ends.

questions.question: Can I vote if I have outstanding fees?
questions.answer: Students with outstanding fees may not be eligible to vote. Please ensure your account is clear before attempting to vote.

questions.question: Is there a way to view my voting history?
questions.answer: No, once you vote, it remains confidential. The system doesn't store or display your previous votes to ensure privacy.
